Class SqlSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rcomputer.genapp.action.SqlSupport

    java.io.Serializable

    public class SqlSupport
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Component used to do additional administer databased data like -C daily backup sqlSupport.backupTenants using _c by taskAgent,sqlSupport.backupTenantC by tenant,sqlSupport.restoreTenantC are used added emailreminder function here, because requestScope cannot call ViewScope beans like xxxHome
    Author:
    j mitra
